item.title: US Capitol statue of teen civil rights leader Barbara Rose Johns to fill Robert E. Lee’s place
item.description: The U.S. Capitol will soon display a statue of a teenaged Barbara Rose Johns as she protested poor conditions at her segregated Virginia high school
